Install VIOS SEA Adapter iFix

  1. Log in to the VIOS as the user padmin.
  2. Exit the restricted shell 
     oem_setup_env 
     set -o vi
  3. Run an adhoc alt_disk_copy
    1. Find out the alt_disk
      altdisk=$(lspv | grep -w altinst_rootvg | awk '{print $1}')
    2. Remove the existing alt_disk
      sudo alt_rootvg_op -X altinst_rootvg
    3. Create an alt_disk
      sudo alt_disk_copy -B -d ${altdisk}
  4. On the Server to be patched, NFS mount the SEA Adapter patch location 
     sudo mount pgnmsv01:/prod/images/vio/vios2/fixpacks /mnt
  1. Install the iFix for SEA Adapters 
    cd /mnt
     sudo  emgr -e ./IJ12143sCd.190221.VIOS2.2.6.30-32.epkg.Z

    Output should be success
